title: Magento Commerce Case Studies | Damas
content:
# Magento Commerce Case Studies | Damas

Damas, a leading Jewelry brand from UAE needed to expand their commerce. After launching the online store on Magento commerce platform, their revenue increased by 23%.


Back To Work Middle East & Africa Solution B2C | Omnichannel SERVICES Consulting & UX DesignDevelopment & IntegrationGrowth Support INDUSTRY Gems & Jewellery WEBSITE damasjewellery.com 23% Revenue 25% New Customers 20% Increase In Order/Day 22% Boost In Avg. Order Value Damas Added a Sparkle with Jewel of Commerce Over a century old business adopts Magento to expand their commerce Established in 1907, Damas Jewellery has earned an unmatched reputation across the entire middle east region. Splattering the essence of authentic craftsmanship, the brand has traveled a long way whilst proving their proficiency year-by-year. Initially established to offer goldsmith services, they launched their first store in 1959, followed by an in-house brand ‘harmony’ in 1988, and so on. After gaining an unbiased reputation, they decided to expand their commerce and adopt Magento. "Jewellery is like the perfect spice - it always complements what’s already there." Diane Von Furstenberg Challenges Understanding the bridge to enhance and expand Showcasing wide range of designs and gems High cost of maintenance of offline stores Enhance the overall shopping experience Expand their reach whilst controlling the overhead expenses Solution Building commerce with passion and dedication Acknowledging the client’s aim to improve customer experience and expand their commerce, the team started building an outline. After closely analyzing the present and past of the brand, it was time to build a bridge using technology. A bridge that connects the present and future of the brand, Damas, and its value. The Strategy Magento can be well-defined as string of features and extensions- We call it Jewel of Commerce. The key focus was kept on building a seamless user experience and ease the backend processes. To attain this, several factors were kept on priority. Strategy included implementing liquid layout using masonary grid, Ajax Wishlist, 100% RTL Support, a 360-degree 3D image view effect to help make better decisions. Each of the integration as done prioritizing the ease of buyers. Having said this, the massive list of products were well-segmented in the user interface to ensure that the visitors doesn’t get lost and spends a healthy time surfing through their wide range of products. Technology Mobile First Design Understood the vision and delivered on a truly on-brand experience. Client Speaks Lama Nasser Omnichannel & Customer Experience Head "A robust and high-performing online store is what I visioned. Krish technocrats enabled the integration of customization appropriately. They were able to execute what they had promised during the development phase. From data migration to Magento commerce implementation, everything was done seamlessly." Result Flaunting the newly added diamonds Apart from these, the average order per day increased by 20% and a 22% hike in average order value was noticed, which eventually boosted the confidence of the client and now they are planning to have Krish as their solution partner for the upcoming online stores for other regions like Bahrain, Kuwait, and others. Just like them, the team of technocrats at Krish also looks ahead to serve them for their future endeavours. Get In Touch Next Case Study Transforming Toolmart's digital infrastructure for better UX. View Case Study Trusted by leading brands
